code: export var ADD_DESCRIPTION='ADD_DESCRIPTION';export var ADD_DESCRIPTION_SUCCESS='ADD_DESCRIPTION_SUCCESS';export var ADD_DESCRIPTION_FAIL='ADD_DESCRIPTION_FAIL';export var ADD_DESCRIPTION_RESET='ADD_DESCRIPTION_RESET';export var addDescription=function addDescription(params){return{type:ADD_DESCRIPTION,params:params};};export var addDescriptionSuccess=function addDescriptionSuccess(response){return{type:ADD_DESCRIPTION_SUCCESS,response:response};};export var addDescriptionFail=function addDescriptionFail(response){return{type:ADD_DESCRIPTION_FAIL,response:response};};export var addDescriptionReset=function addDescriptionReset(){return{type:ADD_DESCRIPTION_RESET};};
